CustomField.description: Field used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) Closing Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do I adequately understand the key buyers' objectives, including their success measures?
CustomField.label: Value Map: Objectives & Success Measures

value.fullName: 1 - I've just started capturing this information
value.label: 1 - I've just started capturing this information

value.fullName: 2 - I'm missing some objectives and/or success measures
value.label: 2 - I'm missing some objectives and/or success measures

value.fullName: 3 - I have all key details and the alignment to our solution is strong
value.label: 3 - I have all key details and the alignment to our solution is strong

value.fullName: 0 - Objectives & Success Measures do not align with our solution
value.label: 0 - Objectives & Success Measures do not align with our solution
